entry.content:

entry.title: New release for Git-Sync: v0.12.0
entry.content:
What's New ‚ùï

git-sync now supports Raw Git URLs. What that means is that apart from syncing your own repositories from various supported platforms, you can now also pass a list of raw git URLs as well.

With this, you can now backup and sync public repositories from other users as well üéâ

More details about the configurations and examples can be found at our Wiki.

Changelog

  • bbd98739fb8fa8318c7c27614118653c53e107d2 chore(deps): :arrow_up: upgrade go to 1.23.4
  • f4cfbac443bb40c22888fee2898ae78bbdffbc39 chore(deps): update golang docker tag to v1.23.4 (#69)
  • 003d3b230c415412911ad623f0de03bbdd49054c chore(deps): update module github.com/google/go-github/v66 to v67 (#68)
  • afc5518ced1aca17a7f6b670c8068996733732e7 chore(deps): update module github.com/google/go-github/v66 to v67 (#70)
  • 243e3e6fc3f2d5632e86d8caa8489540cd57906d chore(deps): update module github.com/xanzy/go-gitlab to v0.114.0 (#67)
  • b3f9643b54950dc5ecd03b461e83771463291906 feat: :rocket: support for raw git urls added

entry.title: New release for Git-Sync: v0.13.0
entry.content:
What's New ‚ùï

Control the number of repos being synced concurrently with the new concurrency option in the configuration. More details can be found in the Wiki.

Changelog

  • 146a29f3dea171817c993c97544ca58474446192 chore(ci): :wrench: remove sort for changelog generation
  • 130bd62548b7cf686936445894103bc25662cf7a feat: :sparkles: add concurrency support

entry.title: New release for Git-Sync: v0.14.0
entry.content:
Important ‚ö†Ô∏è

Use the version 0.14.1 instead of this which fixes the bug introduced in this release üôèüèΩ

What's New!

This release majorly helps the users who have a large number of repositories to sync and often run into rate limiting issues.

git-sync now supports passing multiple personal access tokens to avoid this issue. The new option is named tokens in the config file, more details can be found in the Wiki.

For simplicity, the token option is deprecated and will be removed in the future during v1.0 release. You can still use it for now but it's recommended to use the tokens option instead.

Apart from this, you will also start seeing warning logs in the console for any invalid configurations that might cause issue after the release of v1.0, so it is advised to fix them as soon as possible.

Changelog

  • 2224fedec8fab63afb23daf54ec4ed725e9c99ad feat: :adhesive_bandage: fix and add new tests
  • 183d751d62fade979987c092173d965d0750c4db feat: :sparkles: multiple tokens support added
  • 20d977502e7ed8843ce07f74fc9939814a35d495 chore: :wrench: systemd service example added
  • 1706015f58becb795baee93dc8c812d9431fdaa8 chore: :wrench: update logger initialized message log type

entry.title: New release for Git-Sync: v0.14.1
entry.content:
This release fixes a bug introduced in the previous 0.14.0 release. Please use this version instead of 0.14.0.

Release notes from previous release for convenience.

What's New!

This release majorly helps the users who have a large number of repositories to sync and often run into rate limiting issues.

git-sync now supports passing multiple personal access tokens to avoid this issue. The new option is named tokens in the config file, more details can be found in the Wiki.

For simplicity, the token option is deprecated and will be removed in the future during v1.0 release. You can still use it for now but it's recommended to use the tokens option instead.

Apart from this, you will also start seeing warning logs in the console for any invalid configurations that might cause issue after the release of v1.0, so it is advised to fix them as soon as possible.

Changelog

  • df5deda383abcc96d756c780d41185e3a40d1c16 chore: :wrench: updating log priority for few messages
  • f529232d72603f8b0b32a9a6ced85fec1df65406 fix: :bug: use token manager for sync operations
  • 5438eb2dc28104caf3148a3af541b14795b0ed2a chore: :recycle: go mod tidy
  • e17435b8143efb25e89c6cd93a1c3a1d830a26c6 chore(deps): update module github.com/xanzy/go-gitlab to v0.115.0 (#74)
